experience.title: Internal Workflow Engine
experience.description: As the Solution Architect and Lead Developer, I designed and architected Simplifi, a mission-critical enterprise platform that automated master data workflows, GRC controls, and compliance reporting. The core value was enabling complex, real-time integration with major enterprise systems, including SAP for business partner management and Pathlock for automated user access provisioning and audit readiness. This full-stack solution featured modular capabilities like ICFR dashboards and Delegation of Authority (DOA), ensuring a secure and streamlined internal control environment.

sections.title: Application Structure
items: Azure, Ubntu, Nginx, Azure WAF, SSO

achievements: Implemented DOA module for group-wide policy and transaction governance
Resolved SAP approval bottlenecks across multi-layered workflows

experience.title: RunRun Ecommerce (Wayno)
experience.description: I served as the Technical Lead, overseeing the architecture and full-stack development of this high-performance, multi-vendor marketplace platform. The key challenge involved architecting a scalable platform capable of supporting multiple simultaneous vendors while managing real-time logistics and delivery. I designed and integrated complex APIs, successfully achieving integration with the Abu Dhabi Police app for compliant courier deliveries. This solution featured comprehensive shop/product management APIs and integrated courier/rider tracking systems for continuous logistics monitoring.

sections.title: Features
items: Live rider tracking using Google APIs

sections.title: Integrations
items: AD Police App with Courier module

sections.title: Technical Stack
items: PHP, Laravel, React Native, SQL, REDIS

achievements: Team Leadership: Led a cross-functional team of backend and frontend developers, ensuring smooth collaboration and timely delivery across sprints
Requirement Gathering: Spearheaded the initial and ongoing requirements analysis, translating business needs into technical specifications.
Testing Coordination: Worked closely with QA testers to define test cases, manage bug tracking, and ensure product quality across releases.
Stakeholder Engagement: Conducted meetings with third-party stakeholders, including government entities, to align on compliance, integrations, and operational workflows.

experience.title: Ducon Outdoor Living (duconodl.com)
experience.description: I led the full-stack architecture and end-to-end delivery of high-visibility commercial websites. This particular project was initially built on PHP/Yii2 while others where built on Concrete5 and Wordpress. The scope included a successful architectural rebuild and migration to Laravel, featuring a complex Salesforce API integration for core backend services. My ownership covered secure architecture, cloud deployment, and the highly responsive product interface.

sections.title: Integrations
items: Salesforce API integration for product catalog
Matterport 3D model integration for showroom virtual tour

sections.title: Technical Stack
items: React, JQuery, Bootstrap, Google Tag Manager

achievements: Led Development Teams: Oversaw and guided a team of developers to ensure timely delivery of high-quality e-commerce solutions.
Application Monitoring & Optimization: Monitored all company e-commerce applications, ensuring performance, security, and scalability.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Worked closely with the digital marketing team to enhance SEO strategies and optimize campaigns for improved visibility and conversions.
System Integrations: Successfully integrated multiple third-party systems and services to streamline operations and improve user experience.
Website Revamp: Spearheaded major website redesigns and enhancements, resulting in improved UI/UX and increased engagement.
